name.baseName: Soil remediation ; In-situ remediation ; Phytoextraction remediation ; Engineering implementation ; Asphalt burial
土壤修复;原位修复;植物提取修复;工程实施;沥青填埋

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Bury the transported asphalt at the treatment site.
所描述的工业过程专门用于通过原位植物提取和随后用沥青掩埋污染物进行土壤修复。它适用于需要清理不同程度金属污染的区域，特别是那些涉及重金属如铅（Pb）、砷（As）和铊（Tl）的情况。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The site taken as a reference for the remediation is an area of 712 m2 located in a disused industrial district of Tuscany (Italy), in the past subjected to various productive activities that led to contamination with various metals, some of which potentially toxic such as lead (Pb), arsenic (As) and thallium (Tl). As it is a “site of national interest”, its exact location is considered confidential and cannot be disclosed.

technology.technologicalApplicability: The described industrial process is used specifically for soil remediation of contaminated sites via in-situ phytoextraction and subsequent burial of contaminants with asphalt. It is intended for applications requiring the clean-up of areas with varying degrees of metal contamination, particularly those involving heavy metals like lead (Pb), arsenic (As), and thallium (Tl).
所描述的工业过程专门用于通过原位植物提取和随后用沥青掩埋污染物进行土壤修复。它适用于需要清理不同程度金属污染的区域，特别是那些涉及重金属如铅（Pb）、砷（As）和铊（Tl）的情况。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Vocciante, M., De Folly D’Auris, A., Franchi, E., Petruzzelli, G. & Ferro, S. CO2 footprint analysis of consolidated and innovative technologies in remediation activities. J Clean Prod 297, 126723 (2021).

Vocciante, M., De Folly D’Auris, A., Franchi, E., Petruzzelli, G. & Ferro, S. CO2 footprint analysis of consolidated and innovative technologies in remediation activities. J Clean Prod 297, 126723 (2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using the data set from this soil remediation process, users should ensure the applicability to sites with similar contamination profiles. Consideration should be given to the geographic and environmental contexts due to the reference to a specific location in Tuscany. Furthermore, the confidentiality of the exact location as a site of national interest must be respected. For modeling purposes, factors such as local regulations, the scale of the remediation, and potential environmental impacts of the asphalt burial must be taken into account.
在使用这个土壤修复过程的数据集时，用户应确保其适用性与污染情况类似的场地。应该考虑到地理和环境背景，因为参考了托斯卡纳的一个特定位置。此外，必须尊重该场所作为国家利益地点的确切位置的保密性。在建模过程中，必须考虑到当地法规、修复的规模以及沥青填埋可能对环境产生的影响等因素。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
